 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעֶה‎</span>] **noun masculine**<sup>[[Isa.16.11|Isa 16:11]]</sup> only **plural** ==internal organs, inward parts (intestines, bowels), belly== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְעָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲיָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; — on form compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 156</sup> [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xiii. 1888, 345</sup>); — plural [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעִים‎</span>] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעֵי‎</span> [[Ps.71.6|Ps 71:6]] + 3 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַי‎</span> [[2Sam.16.11|2Sam 16:11]] + 9 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעָ֑י‎</span> [[Ps.22.15|Ps 22:15]]; [[Ps.40.9|Ps 40:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעֶיךָ‎</span> [[Gen.15.4|Gen 15:4]] + 6 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַיִךְ‎</span> [[Gen.25.23|Gen 25:23]]; [[Num.5.22|Num 5:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעָיו‎</span> [[2Sam.20.10|2Sam 20:10]] + 5 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Ezek.7.19|Ezek 7:19]] — 

**1.** literally: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁפֹּךְ מֵעָיו אַ֫רְצָה‎</span> [[2Sam.20.10|2Sam 20:10]] ***and he poured out his inward parts on the ground*** (through a wound); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַחֲלֵה מ‎</span> [[2Chr.21.15|2Chr 21:15]]; [[2Chr.21.18|2Chr 21:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָָֽצְאוּ מ‎</span> v[[2Chr.21.15|2Chr 21:15]] v[[2Chr.21.19|2Chr 21:19]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** as digestive organs, but without precision, nearly = ***stomach***, ***belly***, [[Job.20.14|Job 20:14]]; [[Ezek.3.3|Ezek 3:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶּטֶן‎</span>), [[Ezek.7.19|Ezek 7:19]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶפֶשׁ‎</span>; both with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלֵא‎</span>), [[Num.5.22|Num 5:22]] so of fish that swallowed Jonah [[Jonah.2.1|Jonah 2:1]]; [[Jonah.2.2|Jonah 2:2]]. 

**2.** source of procreation: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁר יצא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמּ‎</span> (said of offspring) [[Gen.15.4|Gen 15:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Sam.7.12|2Sam 7:12]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַרְעֲךָ‎</span>), [[2Sam.16.11|2Sam 16:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶאֱצָאֵי מ‎</span> [[Isa.48.19|Isa 48:19]] (\|\| ***id.***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיצִיאֵי מ‎</span> [[2Chr.32.21|2Chr 32:21]]. 

**3.** = ***womb***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנֵי לְאֻמִּים מִמֵּעַיִח יִפָּרֵ֑דוּ‎</span> [[Gen.25.23|Gen 25:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶּטֶן‎</span>), compare [[Isa.49.1|Isa 49:1]] (\|\| ***id.***), [[Ps.71.6|Ps 71:6]] (\|\| ***id.***), [[Ruth.1.11|Ruth 1:11]]. 

**4.** in general = ***inwards, inward part***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִבִּי ֗֗֗ נָמֵס בְּתוֺךְ מ‎</span> [[Ps.22.15|Ps 22:15]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרָֽתְךָ בְּתוֺךְ מ‎</span> [[Ps.40.9|Ps 40:9]]. 

**5.** figurative = seat of emotions: pity, [[Isa.16.11|Isa 16:11]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶרֶב‎</span>); of God's compassion, [[Jer.31.20|Jer 31:20]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רחם‎</span>; in both subject of verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָמוּ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲמוֺן מֵעֶיךָ‎</span> [[Isa.63.15|Isa 63:15]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַחֲמֶיךָ‎</span>); distress, [[Jer.4.19|Jer 4:19]] (twice in verse) (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַי חֳמַרְמָרוּ‎</span> [[Lam.1.20|Lam 1:20]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵב‎</span>), [[Lam.2.11|Lam 2:11]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּבֵד‎</span> ***liver***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַי רֻתְּחוּ‎</span> [[Job.30.27|Job 30:27]] (dubious, see [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]); love, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַי הָמוּ עָלָיו‎</span> [[Song.5.4|Song 5:4]]. 

**6.** the external belly, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעָיו עֶשֶׁת שֵׁן‎</span> [[Song.5.14|Song 5:14]].
